body_html:
I'm not 100% certain that this is what I was looking for: I think it would be most helpful to have the setup helper to also work for a custom op lib (Which it might already mostly work and I just didn't notice. We would not link to _C for those, I think.)
The other question I had was "how would a C++ app find the custom ops", but maybe that is their problem.
